alert.note: Alert for Borden; Dawson; Howard; Martin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 09 at 9:44PM CDT until April 09 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Borden County in western Texas... Northern Howard County in western Texas... Northeastern Martin County in western Texas... Southeastern Dawson County in western Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 944 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Ackerly, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Big Spring, Ackerly, Coahoma, Luther, Knott and Vealmoor. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 175 and 180. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
